item.title: India’s Income Pyramid: Where Do You Stand?
item.description:
India’s Income Pyramid: Where Do You Stand?

Have you ever stopped and thought: “Where exactly do I fall in India’s income pyramid?”

Let’s be honest. Most of us don’t. We just know whether rent hurts this month or if that Swiggy order stings our wallet. But the truth is—India is split into income segments so wildly different that it almost feels like different countries inside one.

This post is my attempt to break that down—not like a boring government PDF, but like a late-night YouTube chat. Grab a chai. Let’s talk numbers, life, and what it means to move up the ladder.
